org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model

Class StanbolSolrVocabulary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model.StanbolSolrVocabulary

  • public class StanbolSolrVocabulary
extends java.lang.Object
    Vocabulary class which provides constant properties to be used in the communication with Solr. Most of these properties point to the fields defined in the schema.xml of Solr.
    Author:
    anil.sinaci

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_TEXT

        public static final java.lang.String SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_TEXT
        Ending characters for dynamic fields of String type. The type of this field is "string" in the Solr schema.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_INDEXEDTEXT

        public static final java.lang.String SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_INDEXEDTEXT
        Ending characters for dynamic fields of String type. This field is indexed with "text_ws" type to tokenize the values and enable case insensitive search on the field. Although "*_t" are copied to stanbolreserved_text_all, this field enables the search only on this field through Solr interface.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_LONG

        public static final java.lang.String SOLR_DYNAMIC_FIELD_LONG
        Ending characters for dynamic fields of Long type.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
